How to install:

#################################################

About the game:

Vegas Penny Slots Pack 2 features five of the best slots in one great package. Play Dolphins Dice, Pyramid Pays 2, Mega Hearts 2, Pirates Plunder, and Polar Pays! In Pirates Plunder, unlock the treasure chests and win up to 80 free games. Can you trigger the Lucky Seal feature in Polar Pays, swim with the dolphins in Dolphin Dice, and win the Chocpot in Mega Hearts 2? Live the Vegas life on your own PC in Vegas Penny Slots Pack 2!
